full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 747 Filed 08/10/22 Page 154 of 228 830 LC2Qmax5 - corrected Alessi - Direct the center portion of this page, please. This says Ms. Maxwell's desk. What is that referring to? A. The DSL computer -- Q. What do you understand Ms. Maxwell's desk to refer to? A. The desk that she use all the time down on the first floor. Q. What room was that in? A. That was in the garden room. Q. And the fourth bullet point, would you please read that for us? A. JE and GM telephone directories placed to the right of the telephone. Q. Is that the same telephone directories that we were talking about earlier? A. Yes. Q. Let's turn now, please, to page 24. I want to look at the section titled stationery. Would you read this aloud for us, please? A. The whole list? Q. Yes, please. A. Three sizes of Jeffrey Epstein notepads. Two sizes of Ghislaine Maxwell and Lady Ghislaine notepads. Letterhead, stationery and envelopes. One pack from each of Mr. Epstein's residences and businesses. Mr. Epstein's personal stationery (writing paper, notepads, envelopes, compliment slips). SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00012439
